options.name: Inline Vector Math
options.description: Determines if Vector math operations should be found in 'Math' or 'Vector*', this also applies to 'Quaternion'.

options.name: Inline Matrix Math
options.description: Determines if Matrix math operations should be found in 'Math' or 'Matrix*'.

options.name: Inline Color Math
options.description: Determines if Color math operations should be found in 'Math' or 'Color*'.

options.name: Include Color Defaults
options.description: Determines if Color* will provide 'default' color presets.
